body:
<!--StartFragment-->

EGBE is a kind, witty, gentle, handsome and God fearing young man. Born to Cameroonian parents, his exuberance and humility should challenge every talented Christian to dig and grow into better versions of themselves.\
\
EGBE is multi talented , he's a

> " Recording Artist/Producer/Song-writer/instrumentalist/worship minister working with the 808 Nation team. (not signed to any label)"

And still choses not to conform to the standards of the world. Despite the pressure to " blow" with his talents , he choses to take the right path. The path of Christ ( the narrow path).\
\
His goals are to spread the love of God through his music and his inspiration comes from God and God alone.\
\
However, with such a unique talent it would have been normal , if he decided to settle in the world's standard and live according to statistics but no he decided to defy the odds .\
\
The ideology that most gospel songs are boring or stereotype doesn't apply to Egbe's songs . He brings out the best in RnB, jazz music etc. He's so dynamic .

<!--EndFragment-->
summary: EGBE is a kind, witty, gentle, handsome and God fearing young man. Born to Cameroonian parents, his exuberance and humility should challenge every talented Christian to dig and grow into better versions of themselves.
